title: Mobile Developer
jobDescription:
• We are looking for proficient React Native developers. Your primary focus will be on developing the Mobile App version of our platform. You will ensure our application is robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure and therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality is important.

Your responsibilities include -

Developing new features.

Building reusable components and libraries for future use.

Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code.

Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of mobile-capable devices and browsers.

Introducing new tools and libraries that will help the team in efficiency and quality.


What are we looking for

2 to 3 years of demonstrated experience and good knowledge of React Native / Android Studio / Git

Experience working with different subsystems of the mobile device like camera, GPS, connectivity, Bluetooth

Strong knowledge on Javascript and typescript

Ability to write React Native unit test cases

Familiarity with ESLint, Redux knowledge, Rxjs is a plus

Experience with VSCode / Firebase / Bitbucket / Sentry is a plus

Familiarity with RESTful APIs

Familiarity with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.

Experience with responsive design systems such as Material Design

Familiarity with scrum flow and Jira will be advantageous to have.

Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements

title: Flutter Developer  - Bangalore
jobDescription:
Flutter Developer
Base location- Bangalore/Bengaluru
Experience - 0 - 2 years Service Type- Paid Internship
Duration - 6 Months
Stipend - 15,000/- per month
No. Of Post - 5 Qualifications Graduate
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Flutter Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Flutter Developer, you
will be responsible for developing cross-platform mobile applications using the Flutter framework.
You will collaborate with our design and development teams to deliver high-quality, scalable, and
performant mobile applications.
Responsibilities:
Develop high-quality, maintainable, and scalable Flutter applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Work closely with UI/UX designers to implement designs into Flutter applications.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code while following best practices and coding standards.
Optimize application performance to ensure a smooth and responsive user experience.
Troubleshoot and debug issues, and provide timely resolutions.
Stay up-to-date with the latest Flutter trends, tools, and technologies, and propose improvements
to our development processes.
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development
efficiency
Proven experience as a Flutter Developer or Mobile App Developer.
Strong proficiency in Dart programming language.
Extensive experience with the Flutter framework and its ecosystem (plugins, packages, etc.).
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming principles and design patterns.
Experience with third-party libraries and APIs integration.
Familiarity with Git version control system.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
Candidate Profile
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience)..
Strong communication and collaboration skills. Experience with Flutter Android or iOS development.
Knowledge of backend development technologies (Node.js, Express, MongoDB, etc.).
Familiarity with continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) pipelines.
Experience with automated testing and test-driven development (TDD).




Company Profile:
DEALSDRAY ONLINE PRIVATE LIMITED
DealsDray is one of the top B2B mobile app platforms in India. We are currently present across 16
states and in more than 400 cities in India and are looking for further expansion. We would like you
to join us on this exciting journey.
Registered office address: 633B, Udyog Vihar, Phase - V, Sector 19, Gurugram, Haryana 122016.
Bangalore office address: Awfis Space Solutions Limited, 11th Floor, Summit-B, ITPL Main Rd, Brigade Metropolis, Garudachar Palya metro station, Mahadevapura, Whitefield Karnataka-560048
Company website: https://www.dealsdray.com/

title: Software Developer ( Intern )
jobDescription:
We're looking for passionate developers who love clean code, TDD and pair programming. If you are someone who spends his/her spare time on open source projects, keep up to date on the latest developments and techniques in the web based communication world, and love to hack on cool new projects, then keep reading! 

We are looking for software development interns to join the Commud gang for both 6 and 8 months terms.  

 Your day at Commud

 Start your day at 9 am

 Do pair programming with another great developer on cool new upcoming features. 

 Collaborate with a designer to make your feature look world-class. 

 Participate in talk about the latest programming languages, tools and frameworks with other developers.  What you Get

 Become a master in Java, HTML5, Ruby and web development. 

 Become a smart mobile application developer. 

 Constantly keep up to date with the latest news and techniques in the programming  design. 

 Be rewarded by your peers for your latest  greatest work through our unique bonus system.
